channel.title: apt on Mryqu's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in apt on Mryqu's Notes

item.title: Linux包管理速查表
item.description: 管理软件包 |任务|apt (deb)|yum (rpm)|zypper (rpm) |—– |通过仓库安装软件包|apt-get install {pkg}|yum install {pkg}|zypper install {pkg} |更新软件包|apt-get install {pkg}|yum update {pkg}|zypper update -t package {pkg} |移除软件包|apt-get remove {pkg}|yum erase {pkg}|zypper remove {pkg} |通过文件安装软件包|dpkg -i {pkg}|yum localinstall {pkg}|zypper install {pkg} 搜索软件包 |任务|apt (deb)|yum (rpm)|zypper (rpm) |—– |通过包名搜索|apt-cache search {pkg}|yum list {pkg}|zypper search {pkg} |通过模式搜索|apt-cache search pattern|yum search pattern|zypper search -t pattern pattern |通过文件名搜索|apt-file search path|yum provides file|zypper wp file |列举已安装软件包|dpkg -l|rpm -qa|zypper search -is |显示软件包信息|apt-cache show pgk-name|yum info {pkg}|zypper info {pkg}
